pages.text: $(italic)In the meantime, you have come into possession of many new materials. It's time to take a close look at each of them to see what effect they have on your potions.$(br)Your educated guess, as an expert: Awesome!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: You always need to add Nether Wart and Blaze Powder. Depending on the Catalyst used you can modify the resulting properties of your Potions. You can add up to three Reagents per Potion. Each Reagent can only be used once per recipe.

pages.title: Mermaids Gems
pages.text: Instead of supplying Water Bottles you can also just add $(l:resources/mermaids_brush)Mermaids Gems$(/l) to the designated slot and use empty Bottles instead.

pages.title: Reagent: Redstone
pages.text: Increases Duration

pages.title: Reagent: Glowstone
pages.text: Increases Level

pages.title: Reagent: Gunpowder
pages.text: Creates Splash Potions

pages.title: Reagent: Dragons Breath
pages.text: Creates Lingering Potions - Also requires Gunpowder$(br2)Allows you to create Tipped Arrows, if you supply Arrows instead of Water Bottles

pages.title: Reagent: Topaz
pages.text: Makes Effects not show any particles

pages.title: Reagent: Amethyst
pages.text: Slightly increases Duration

pages.title: Reagent: Citrine
pages.text: Slight chance to increase Level

pages.title: Reagent: Onyx
pages.text: Adds a very weird taste and smell to the potion, making it unidentifiable.$(br)Also makes its color completely black.

pages.title: Reagent: Moonstone
pages.text: Changes all otherwise negative Effects to their positive ones

pages.title: Reagent: Shimmerstone
pages.text: Tiny chance to increase both Duration and Level

pages.title: Reagent: Quitoxic Powder
pages.text: Increases Level of negative Effects by 1

pages.title: Reagent: Crimtane
pages.text: Greatly increases the Effects Potency, at the cost of adding a random negative Effect

pages.title: Reagent: Paltaeria
pages.text: Adds a random positive Effect

pages.title: Reagent: Stardust
pages.text: $(italic)Absorbs the last drops of what remains of your previous brew.$()$(br2)Small chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously

pages.title: Reagent: Star Fragment
pages.text: $(italic)Similar to Stardust, but much more potent.$()$(br2)Reasonable chance to add the main Effect of the Potion that was brewed previously

pages.title: Reagent: Lightning Stone
pages.text: Increases the Potions Effect at the beginning, but wearing off over time [multiple effects with different levels / durations]

pages.title: Reagent: Azurite
pages.text: Removes the duration penalty for Splash and Lingering Potions, decreases the penalty for Tipped Arrows
